name: Dice Beetle
description:
Instead of dung, this little beetle likes to roll a die around! Try and get it to the goal with the special beetle face pointing upwards.

Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2022, for the theme "Roll of the Dice"

Controls:
Move - Arrow Keys / DPad
Show Faces - Space / Xbox A
Restart Level - Backspace / Xbox Y 

Music is Sand in Shoes by Anipatok
Font is a tweaked version of Futile Pro by Eeve Somepx
Sound effects made in ChipTone by Tom Vian
